document_data.title: Return to the Glory
document_data.author: [[Chris Lindsay]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Return to the Glory''''' is an adventure for 5{{th}} edition ''[[Dungeons & Dragons]]'' released in 2020 to raise money for the charity [[wikipedia:Red Nose Day|Red Nose Day]]. The adventure is set in the [[Orsraun Mountains]], and is intended to be run with [[orc]] player characters.

{{Quote|Your people once dominated everything south of the mountains; you had the greatest, most advanced underground stronghold ever known to orc-kind. Then the cataclysm happened. Centuries have passed, and only a few tribes have survived and assembled under the banner of one cause. Reclaim what was once yours! 

This adventure is designed for four to six orc characters, levels 6 to 8.

All proceeds from your purchase are donated to Red Nose Day.}}

Index.Magic: :;Magic Items: ''[[Eye of Gruumsh (magic item)|Eye of Gruumsh]]''
